content: Sept 25 U.S. automotive replacement parts distributor Genuine Parts Co said on Monday it would buy European rival Alliance Automotive Group in a deal valued at about $2 billion  including debt.
name: Genuine Parts Company
title: Genuine Parts to buy European rival in $2 bln deal
